trans-unit.source: Implements the `GetFrameworkPath` task.
trans-unit.target: Implementa il `GetFrameworkPath` attività.

trans-unit.source: Use the `GetFrameworkPath` element in your project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la `GetFrameworkPath` elemento nel file di progetto per creare ed eseguire questa attività.

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [GetFrameworkPath Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sull'utilizzo e sui parametri, vedere [attività GetFrameworkPath](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GetFrameworkPath"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GetFrameworkPath"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: There is no execution that takes place for the `GetFrameworkPath` task, instead the task supports only getting and setting of properties.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica alcuna esecuzione che ha luogo per il `GetFrameworkPath` attività invece l'attività supporta solo il recupero e impostazione delle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il percorso della cartella che contiene il [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1 assembly.

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso della cartella che contiene il [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1 assembly.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il percorso della cartella che contiene il [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 assembly.

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso della cartella che contiene il [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 assembly.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.0 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il percorso della cartella che contiene il [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.0 assembly.

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.0 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso della cartella che contiene il [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.0 assembly.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il percorso della cartella che contiene il [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 assembly.

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso della cartella che contiene il [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 assembly.

trans-unit.source: Path to the v4.0 framework, if available
trans-unit.target: Percorso al framework v&4;.0, se disponibile

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Path to the v4.5 framework, if available
trans-unit.target: Percorso al framework v&4;.5, se disponibile

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the latest version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il percorso della cartella che contiene la versione più recente di [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assembly.

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the latest version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso della cartella che contiene la versione più recente di [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assembly.
